titles.title: Jesus Has Set Me Free, Yes Jesus Has Set Me Free

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus has set me free, yes Jesus has set me free.
Now, I am free indeed.
The Holy Spirit came my way.
Now, I'm shouting night and day.
I'm free from condemnation and sin.
And when the devil then said No,
Then I just tell him where to go.
There's no way that he can win.
So glory, Hallelujah, praise His name forever.
I've come away from where I've been.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So come along and sing this song.
And you can join this happy throng
That's going to the promised Land.
Jesus is the Pattern Son.
The victory's already won.
So come on up and take your land.
